scripts.reset-main-branch: git checkout --orphan latest_branch && git add -A && git commit -am "First commit ;-)" && git branch -D main && git branch -m main && git push -f --set-upstream origin main
scripts.first-push: npm run git-init && git add . && git commit -m "first commit" && git branch -M main && git remote add origin https://github.com/MaslowCorporation/steam-uevr-wheel.git && git push -u origin main
scripts.first-push-dev: npm run git-init && git add . && git commit -m "first commit" && git branch -M main && git remote add origin https://github.com/MaslowCorporation/steam-uevr-wheel.git && git push -u origin main
scripts.push: (git add . && git commit -m "I'm a bigger pusher than Ice-T homie !!!" && git push) || exit 0
